results.name: First differences of A003146.
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10608
Elena Barcucci, Luc Belanger and Srecko Brlek, On tribonacci sequences, Fib. Q., 42 (2004), 314-320. See page 317.
F. Michel Dekking, Jeffrey Shallit, and N. J. A. Sloane, Queens in exile: non-attacking queens on infinite chess boards, Electronic J. Combin., 27:1 (2020), #P1.52.
formula: a(n+1) = 7 - t(n)*(t(n) + 1)/2, n >= 0, where t(n) = A080843(n). - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Dec 06 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 27 2016
